biocontainers.name: pirs
biocontainers.summary: Profile based illumina pair-end reads simulator

biotools.summary:
pIRS is a program for simulating paired-end reads from a reference genome.  It
is optimized for simulating reads similar to those generated from the Illumina
platform.

bioschemas.name: pirs
bioschemas.summary:
pIRS is a program for simulating paired-end reads from a reference genome.  It
is optimized for simulating reads similar to those generated from the Illumina
platform.
